cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class backend

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.backend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ibackend, java.io.Serializable

    public class backend
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Ibackend
    The backend class allows for the creation of a backend instance. A backend has a hashMap called database that contains all Users.
    Author:
    Zack Colello and Anna Genke
    See Also:
